thread.section_title: Globus Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Globus | globusjourneys.com | 2 of 44
thread.title: Alex Peat

author: Alex Peat
title: Alex Peat
text:
Our Guide was personable, friendly, professional, and took care of us throughout the trip. The destinations were fantastic. Great views of the Matterhorn, Lake Lucerne, Vienna, Salzburg, and Bertchesgarden.
I enjoy mountainous country and this was a wonderful breath of fresh air (pardon the pun).
I would recommend Globus tours to anyone. I've already told quite a few friends and family about our trip.
